question: Babur, the founder of the mighty Mughal Empire traced his lineage from :
option1: Timur from paternal line and Chengiz Khan from Maternal Line
option2: Chengiz Khan from Paternal Line and Timur from Maternal line
option3: Chagatai Turks from paternal and maternal side.
option4: Mongoloids from paternal and Maternal side
answer: Timur from paternal line and Chengiz Khan from Maternal Line
explanation: Babur is the founder of Mughal Empire. He Traced his lineage from paternal line and Chengiz Khan from Maternal Line.
